mapper.sql: log_id AS logId, original_business_id AS originalBusinessId, after_id AS afterId, current_amount AS currentAmount, phone_number AS phoneNumber, repay_status AS repayStatus, create_time AS createTime, create_user AS createUser, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select:
select log_id AS logId, original_business_id AS originalBusinessId, after_id AS afterId, current_amount AS currentAmount, phone_number AS phoneNumber, repay_status AS repayStatus, create_time AS createTime, create_user AS createUser, update_time AS updateTime from tb_withholding_record_log
1=1 and original_business_id=#{originalBusinessId} and after_id=#{afterId}
